substeps.plaintext: After talking to Katheryne, the player unlocks Commissions in the Adventurer Handbook.
substeps.markdown: After talking to Katheryne, the player unlocks ◀Commissions▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Commissions▷ in the ◀Adventurer Handbook▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Adventurer_Handbook▷.

substeps.plaintext: The player can optionally complete the commissions before talking to Katheryne.
substeps.markdown: The player can optionally complete the commissions before talking to Katheryne.

steps.plaintext: Complete 4 Daily Commissions then talk to Katheryne
steps.markdown: Complete 4 Daily Commissions then talk to Katheryne

substeps.plaintext: This step is skipped if the player already completed all 4 Daily Commissions prior to step 1.
substeps.markdown: This step is skipped if the player already completed all 4 Daily Commissions prior to step 1.
